phrase.motto:
The most important
App of the day.
phrase.usage: Use $[Bfast] to quickly and safely pick-up your food without delay.

phrase.title: Bfast
phrase.enterPhoneNumber: Enter your phone number and click Reset button to change your password.
phrase.enterSecretCode: Type the secret code from the SMS we sent to the form below.
phrase.enterPassword: Choose new password and click on the button below. As far 8 symbols, 1 uppercase, 1 special symbol required.
phrase.success: Your password was successfully changed. Go to sign in page and continue use your account.
